Description: Blue glazed composition shabti of Horkhebi; arms crossed to hold two hoes; darker glazed fillet, eyes and eyebrows, striations of lappet wig, outlines of hoes, enclosed vertical line of hieroglyphs on front identifying deceased as temple scribe of the Amun domain, and seed-baskets on the back.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Emily Anne Beaufort Smythe, Viscountess Strangford
